channel.title: Posts on Cole Sullivan's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Cole Sullivan's Website

item.title: Time Of Possesion means playoffs for NFL Teams?
item.description: Growing up watching Sunday Night Football with my dad is a tradition I cherished. As we all know you can’t just watch sports, there’s always a debate going on. That is were the stat Time Of Possession became my main focal point in predicting playoff teams. Hopefully with the next three graphs I can get you to believe just like me. When looking at the NFL one of the most important ways to win games is to score points.

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc. There are many differences in syntax between Blackfriday’s Markdown and Pandoc’s Markdown.
